info.title: Window Covering

windowcovering.name: windowcovering
windowcovering.description: This Resource describes the information of a window covering, i. e. , type, configuration status, and mode. Velocity associated with lifting the window covering can be changed by updating Lift_Velocity(cm/sec). Ramp up/down times to reaching the velocity setting can be changed by updating Lift_Acceleration Time/Lift_Deceleration Time (0. 1sec).

windowcoveringtype.name: windowcoveringtype
windowcoveringtype.description: Window covering type. See OCF enumeration map for set of valid values.

liftvelocity.name: liftvelocity
liftvelocity.description: Velocity in cm/sec associated with lifting the covering

controllift.name: controllift
controllift.description: Closed loop control allows for intermediate settings, open loop supports only up or down

controltilt.name: controltilt
controltilt.description: Closed loop control allows for intermediate settings, open loop supports only tilted or not tilted

rotationdirection.name: rotationdirection
rotationdirection.description: Identifies if the direction of rotation has been reversed to match physical installation.

liftaccelerationtime.name: liftaccelerationtime
liftaccelerationtime.description: Ramp up time to reach lift velocity (ms)

liftdecelerationtime.name: liftdecelerationtime
liftdecelerationtime.description: Ramp down time from the velocity setting (ms)

calibration.name: calibration
calibration.description: True = calibration mode, False = normal mode

ledfeedback.name: ledfeedback
ledfeedback.description: True = feedback enabled, False = LEDs are off

maintenance.name: maintenance
maintenance.description: True = maintenance mode, False = normal mode

motordirection.name: motordirection
motordirection.description: True = direction reversed, False = direction normal
